name: IRON WORLD
description:
You have come from outer space to the devastated Earth. You are a man of the past, trapped in a rough and bleak future of the IRON WORLD. Can you survive?

A personal ride

Drive your own car. Carry your stuff in the trunk. Shoot away with your turret or crush your enemies under the wheels.

Random events

Random loot, random enemies, random events, random level generation. Each game will be different from the last.

Explore the world

Before you is a ruined world. You are free to go wherever you want. Towns, farms, mountains and the wasteland itself await you. Realistic layout of buildings and their interior allows for a more immersive CQB action. What's waiting around the corner? Create your own adventure.


Uncompromising fights

Dynamic and bloody battles. Move quickly, use cover, ambush your foes. Use grenades and boosters to survive and overwhelm even the deadliest of enemies.

Tactical AI

The enemies will react to your actions. They will detect you by noise, and will look for you after you've hidden from sight. Rest assured - they will find you, and they will surprise you.

Visual style

Carefully constructed atmosphere of devastation and ruin. Very detailed locations. Original artstyle.

Craft

Scavenge resources from every available source. Craft food, ammo and drugs. Good nutrition is key to survival.

Charismatic NPCs

Meet colorful NPCs as you explore. We put work into creating interesting, sarcastic, cynical characters.
